reviews.review: absolutely every game, with prime status, against or for cheaters

I used to enjoy CS:GO at first. But not anymore. It is impossible to play rank game to rank up after Master Guardian anymore. I matched with LEM and Supreme in rank game which I am not suppose to be matching against/with, And there are still tons of cheaters using spin bots and still not getting banned because Valve simply doesn't care about it. The only thing they care about is how to squeeze every penny out of players. Screenshots below to see the CS GO rank matchmaking in nutshell.

https://drive.google.com/file/d/11iNFQmNIxw60u_X45W0FZn1-yf31bZ2z/view?usp=sharing
https://drive.google.com/file/d/1SGM0d2KDJrhnl3ZXE9YXiIpDBMvsjS8W/view?usp=sharing

This is a very educating game. It will learn you:
- What high blood pressure is
- What hackers are
- Russian
- Curse words all over the world
- What anger issues are
- Not to rage quit a comp match

And last but not least: That skins give skills :D

Thanks for reading my review and stay safe!
